overview:
Carter McClelland is the Chairman of, and a Partner in, Union Square Advisors. Prior to joining Union Square, Mr. McClelland most recently served as President of Bank of America New York Market and Chairman of Bank of America Securities.

Previously he was President and Chief Executive Officer and member of the board directors of Deutsche Bank North America. Mr. McClelland’s Wall Street career spans more than 30 years, including 21 years at Morgan Stanley, where he was Chief Administrative Officer and a member of the firm’s operating committee.

McClelland currently serves as Chairman of the Board of the United Way of New York City, is a member of Mayor Bloombergâ€™s Commission on Poverty and serves on the National Council on Economic Education.
